Name: BLISS PLUS Hand Blender
Short description: With the Bliss SS hand blender by Kutchina, you can blend ingredients effortlessly. With a 400 W powerful and efficient motor along with strong and sturdy stainless steel blades, this immersion stick facilitates convenient blending. From soups food to savoury dips – make it all with this hand blender. Equipped with an ergonomic handle, you can easily perform all your mixing or blending tasks with just one hand. The detachable shaft of the blender allows easy cleaning and storing. This magic stick comes with a warranty of one year.
Description: ['Excellent results every time: The 400 W powerful Bliss Plus hand blender by Kutchina comes with a frequency of 50 Hz, which makes it ideal for various applications like blending, whisking, and mixing. It ensures quick performance and excellent results every time you use it.', 'Versatile: Known for its versatility and high performance, this device is your ideal kitchen companion. Simplify your hectic life by reducing the preparation time with this versatile kitchen tool. Explore delicious smoothies, sumptuous shakes, lip-smacking sauces, and dips with this hand blender.', 'Comfort: This mixing stick is lightweight and its ergonomic handle easily fits in your hands, making it convenient to carry out different tasks. The easily detachable shaft facilitates easy storage and cleaning.', 'Material type: Made with superior-quality stainless steel material, this mixing stick is durable and long-lasting.\xa0', 'Sharp blades: The sharp stainless steel blades of this hand blender ensures perfect results each time. The sharp blades are perfect for blending shakes, soups, purees and smoothies. Besides, the blades are covered with a guard that prevents splashing or spillages of liquids.', 'Two-speed operation: The blender comes with two-speed options, which you can easily adjust with just one hand.\xa0\xa0', 'Easy storage: The detachable shaft of the device makes it easy to store the appliance. The compact design ensures that it doesn’t take too much space on the kitchen countertop.\xa0', 'Warranty: This hand blender comes with a warranty period of one year from the purchase date.\xa0']
Technical specification: ['Voltage (V) :-  : AC220-240V', 'Frequency (Hz) :-  : 50Hz', 'Accessories :-  : NO', 'Rated working time :-  :  ≤1min', 'Features :-  :  300W, Detachable body,ABS Mixing stick']

Name: BLISS SS PLUS Hand Blender
Short description: The stylish and efficient Bliss DLX hand blender by Kutchina is your perfect kitchen companion. With this multipurpose hand blender, fitted with sharp and powerful stainless steel blades, you can blend, whisk, beat, and chop vegetables. The hand blender comes with two convenient push-button speed options that let you prepare batter, dips, and sauces very easily. This appliance ensures faster and efficient performance. The ergonomic handle facilitates comfortable grip. The detachable parts make it convenient to use, clean and store. It comes with with a 700 ml beaker and chopper & whisk. This device comes with a warranty of two years.
Description: ['Sharp blades: Equipped with sharp stainless steel blades, the Bliss SS Plus hand blender by Kutchina lets you prepare purees, sumptuous shakes and smoothies, lip-smacking dips and sauces. The blade comes with a splash guard cover that keeps it safe and prevents any kind of spillage.', 'Quick meal preparation: Take food preparation and comfort to new heights with this 400 W powerful kitchen appliance. Make savoury dips, sauces, and idli or cake batter in a jiffy with this mixing stick.', 'Aesthetics: Sleek and stylish, this modern kitchen tool looks aesthetically pleasing. The sophisticated design and superior quality make this kitchen tool exceptional.\xa0', 'Detachable body: The hand blender comes with detachable parts that can be easily separated and assembled. All the parts can be detached and cleaned easily.\xa0', 'Two-speed options: The mixing stick comes with a two-speed option that lets you perform all the grinding and mixing tasks easily.\xa0', 'Ergonomic handle: The hand blender has an ergonomic handle that ensures a firm and comfortable grip. This makes grinding, blending, and chopping very easy. Perform all the tasks of meal preparation by changing speed modes with just one hand.', 'Accessories: This appliance comes with a 700 ml beaker along with chopper and whisk. With this single kitchen appliance, you can blend, chop and whisk ingredients effortlessly.\xa0', 'Warranty: This versatile appliance comes with a warranty of two years.']
